website_summaries.verdict: The Inov-8 Mudclaw 275 was able to receive positive feedback from various consumers, especially those who desired a form-fitting and near-ground experience that tackled the terrains with ease. The gripe about it was about its Precision Fit, which seemed to make the in-shoe experience a bit tight.
pros: People liked the grip capacity of the Inov-8 Mudclaw 275’s outsole unit
The soft yet close-to-the-ground configuration of the midsole was considered efficient
The mesh material used on the upper unit was deemed highly breathable and form-fitting
Runners felt that the overlays of the façade helped in securing the foot
The anti-debris façade did a solid job of preventing debris from entering the foot-chamber, according to a couple of testers
cons: The running-specific Precision Fit profile of this shoe restricted the forefoot section, according to a few consumers

customer_reviews.title: Monster grip
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! Ran in them for the Spartan Super and Sprint races at Black ountain this weekend. Much better than the 265. Drain almost immediately, lightweight, and have super sticky grip. When walking on grass or flat ground, still comfortable as I can't even feel the giant grippy lugs on the bottom. Smooth run. My favorite OCR shoe!
customer_reviews.author: KrisN0514

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used for Spartan races!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Spartan Races. I've run 11+ races (mix of Beast, Super, and Sprints) with these shoes and they have been amazing. I am able to get through muddy terrain much quicker than most people on the course and they do just as well on other terrain. I wash them in the washing machine after each race weekend and they have still held up. I tried the new RD shoes from Spartan because they were so hyped up but they were terrible. Slipped around everywhere and could feel almost everything against my feet because the sides are so thin. I am definitely sticking with Inov8!
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if this is a ladies model , but it is narrow. I know this is not normal as I own this brand of shoe in a different model. These shoes will meet my needs and I can live with it being on the tighter side. But beware this is not a wide sneaker .
customer_reviews.author: bobinsf

customer_reviews.title: 15 is nice long but disproportionally narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sole. It looks super useful for muddy trails! The length is perfect for a men's size 15. However the width appears to be that of a 10. Inov-8, bigger size doesn't mean only longer, it has to be wider as well. Give it a try and maybe you'll be able to sell more of the bigger sizes, reduce the number of returns, or both. Also an extra inch too much wouldn't bug a narrow 15 person as much as a narrow 10 person since its proportionally less. So there is less danger to err toward a wider shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Great for OCR
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these last minute for a Spartan race and I was very happy with how they performed. I did not slip once, even while walking down steep, muddy hills. They drained very quickly as well after walking through shallow water. Overall great product for a reasonable price (similar shoes cost $120 and upwards).
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' teacher

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend going a half size up. It is narrow. I bought these for Spartan Super and Sprint races in Chino 2020. During the Super I really didn’t have any issues. These bad boys griped really good. But when I wore them the day after for the Sprint I decided to put foot glide but I guess I missed a spot. Because after the race I ended with two HUGE blisters on my big toe. So order a half or full size up if you can. I also wear compression socks and ankle braces in case your wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: Zero arch support
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I will not be able to keep them as they have absolutely zero arch support. If you tend to overpronate at all, good luck finding insoles that will work for these narrow shoes. Also, they run a full size smaller than Nike or ASICS, and will only work if you have narrow, neutral feet.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Grip/Traction I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving these shoes. I haven't put them to the full test yet, but I have been breaking them in proper. I am an avid obstacle course racer and these are turning out to be a favorite. I have a few different trail runners I race in and I'm going to say these have the best grip/traction of them all, no slipping or sliding what's so ever. They do however lack the cushion that some of my other shoes have, but still comfortable for a decent distance. I strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo_OCR

customer_reviews.title: impressive traction but no support inside
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for even better traction than the Solomon speedcross. These might win that contest but at a price. Maybe it's for a specific event, but I find these horribly incomfortable. They have flat interiors with no support.
customer_reviews.author: mattmattmatt

customer_reviews.title: Best ever - kinda sneakers you would take on a 100 mile road walk
customer_reviews.text: I loved these sneakers so much I ended up buying 2 during a sale, I use these frequently and they are awesome for any trail running or long distance walking. Everyone comments on the build quality and styling, I just wish amazon would sell the red version soon.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Zeciri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ran a Spartan Sprint in these shoes and they were amazing! It poured the morning of the race and I had no issues slipping on trails or any of the obstacles! I would definitely recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Feels light and fits snug. A bit narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is true to size, but it is very narrow which makes it a little tight around the foot. They do feel really light which is nice. I broke the shoes in with a 13-mile trail run and they felt great. I'll be running a Spartan Ultra later this month with these shoes and will post how they held up.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for OCR
customer_reviews.text: Just used these for a brutal, rainy, 15+ mile OCR and these shoes did everything I could ask for. I didn’t slip at all, even in less than preferable conditions. Great drainage and grip!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Trimboli

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many a pair of Inov8’s over the years, and I have never had a pair come so narrow. Not a fan at all. Going back to the old school mudclaw 300’s
customer_reviews.author: Renee Minutola

customer_reviews.title: A little small,  but great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shows are great the size was a little small, as soon the refund is issued I Will order hale a number bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M Botti

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome traction and the fit is pretty good a little narrow but ok.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They were small, I will need a size up. I'll try the 10.5
customer_reviews.author: greg fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Shoes have a snug fit which is needed for OCT.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome for obstacle course training. They breeze right through mud and dirt terrain. Super easy to clean off after a mud run with a simple spray hose. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Villa

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Go a complete size up this shoes are really narrow, but the grip this shoes has is wonderful for OCR I recommended
customer_reviews.author: Joelclaudio

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, size up
customer_reviews.text: Because I read reviews I sized up by 1/2 size.. only needed a few days to break in! Excellent shoe for Spartan Beast in Tahoe!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore these during a savage race last weekend. They performed fantastic. Drain extremely well. Gripped extremely well. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A Karem

customer_reviews.title: Great price,great product,super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping next day, these shoes Will work well when I play softball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon doesn’t honor returns! Don’t buy things you might have to return!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon will NOT honor returns- do not buy clothes, shoes or any items you might have to return. These shoes were not sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that someone can actually wear
customer_reviews.text: Great every day shoe that someone can actually wear and at a good price too!
customer_reviews.author: DeGeP

customer_reviews.title: Great for mud runs
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect for mud runs. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these, fit much better than Solomons speedcross 5's . They feel like an extension of my foot. I am a very particular person when it comes to shoes and I have found a winner. My feet are also not narrow, they are average/wide and they fit amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Red Trainers
customer_reviews.text: I give 5 stars here..as they are just fabulous and soo comfortable! Quality super! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: inov-8 Inov8 Mudclaw 275 Trail Running Shoes - AW20
product_meta.description: Inov8 Mudclaw 275 Trail Running Shoes The most agile trail running shoe on the market, designed to propel runners faster than ever before through all soft ground. The MUDCLAW 275 works naturally with the foot, allowing trail runners and obstacle racers to move fast and react even faster to changes in terrain. Inov8 Shoe Fit Scale For technical footwear, a good fit is essential to enhance your performance. Inov8's new Shoe Fit Scale makes it easier to find the perfect fitting shoe. All Inov8 shoes are designed with Met-Cradle technology to lock down the mid-foot for a stable hold, where they differ is in the toe box. The shoes are now graded from 1 to 5, Grade 1 representing their closest, most precise fit and Grade 5 representing the widest fitting toe box. The lower the number on the scale, the narrower the fit, which ensures minimal internal movement of the foot when running fast on technical terrain. Shoes with the higher numbers on the scale will suit athletes with a wider foot and those wanting that extra comfort in the toe box. This wider toe box allows the toes to splay for increased stability when lifting heavy weights. It's also perfect for longer runs and races when toes begin to swell. Inov8 have graded the Mudclaw 275 Trail Running Shoes as Grade 1. Breathable Upper The highly-breathable, non-water absorbing upper keeping you dry at all times. By preventing water from entering the shoe, the upper gives you peace of mind in wet and muddy conditions whilst the breathable upper allows cool air to flow into the shoe, absorbing moisture and keeping you damp free. Overlayer encases the upper providing added durability and a more enhanced fit whilst unique on-the-shoe gaiter hooks offer a more secure attachment system, which allows a race ultra gaiter to be secured directly to the shoe and defend against debris. Additionally, a gusseted tongue prevents debris from entering the shoe whilst also providing ultimate comfort. Exterflow Midsole Infused w
feature_bullets: Breathable - Allows cool air to flow into the shoe whilst hot humid air flows out.
Waterproof - Keeps water from entering inside the shoe.
Gaiter Hooks - Provides a more secure attachment system.
Gusseted Tounge - Locks out trail debris from penetrating through the inner of the shoe.
Exterflow Midsole - Provides a high level of cushioning.
